item.title: Car Wizard: Age Catches Up to Cars Too
item.description: We explore how aging affects vehicles, from wear and tear to performance, and what owners can do to keep their cars running longer.

media:content.media:title: Car Wizard: Age Catches Up to Cars Too
media:content.media:description: We explore how aging affects vehicles, from wear and tear to performance, and what owners can do to keep their cars running longer.

item.title: The True Cost of Owning a Vintage Euro Car
item.description: We break down the real expenses of owning a vintage European car, from maintenance to repairs, so you know what it truly takes to keep it running.

item.title: I Know What's Causing That Car Noise
item.description: We pinpoint the exact cause of a car noise, explaining what’s happening and how to fix it so you never have to wonder again.

item.title: Lies People Tell in the Car Business
item.description: We expose the common lies and misleading tactics people use in the car industry, sharing real experiences and tips to spot them.

item.title: Identifying the Source of That Noise
item.description: We investigate a mysterious car noise and reveal exactly what's causing it.

item.title: 2003 Bentley & 2016 Volvo: Repair Worth It?
item.description: Examining issues with a 2003 Bentley and 2016 Volvo, discussing repair costs, reliability, and whether investing in fixes is practical for each vehicle.

item.title: Customer Alarmed by Vehicle Leak
item.description: A vehicle leak causes concern for a customer, highlighting inspection, diagnosis, and how to safely identify and address potential issues before they escalate.

item.title: How to Check for Vehicle Leaks
item.description: A step-by-step guide on identifying leaks in a vehicle, covering common sources, diagnostic tips, and practical solutions to prevent further damage.

item.title: Toyota Models You Might Not Know
item.description: A look at lesser-known Toyota models, highlighting unique features, history, and what makes these vehicles stand out from the more common lineup.

item.title: Honda CRV Inspection: No Issues Found
item.description: A Honda CRV was nearly charged $2,000 for repairs, but inspection revealed no problems, emphasizing careful diagnostics and avoiding unnecessary expenses.

item.title: Honda CRV Rattle: Last Resort Fix
item.description: A Honda CRV develops a persistent rattle, leading to a final repair attempt, highlighting troubleshooting, diagnostic techniques, and practical solutions for car owners.

item.title: A Very Special Car Model
item.description: A close look at a unique and rare car model, highlighting its features, design, and what makes it stand out from standard vehicles.

item.title: Do Reliable Land Rovers Exist?
item.description: An exploration of Land Rover reliability, examining common issues, maintenance considerations, and whether some models offer dependable ownership.

item.title: Bargain Luxury SUV’s $3K Surprise
item.description: An affordable luxury SUV incurs unexpected $3,000 costs, highlighting maintenance, repairs, and considerations for buyers seeking value without surprises.

item.title: So Many Cracks!
item.description: A detailed look at extensive cracks, highlighting the inspection, analysis, and potential solutions to address structural or material issues safely.

item.title: Toyota Collaborates with Yamaha on Engine
item.description: A look at Toyota’s partnership with Yamaha to develop a high-performance engine, exploring design, features, and what makes this collaboration unique in the automotive world.

item.title: German Cars Can Be Expensive
item.description: An overview of the costs associated with owning German cars, covering purchase price, maintenance, and parts to help buyers understand long-term expenses.

item.title: Mercedes E320 Challenge
item.description: A detailed look at a Mercedes E320 that troubled another shop, highlighting common issues, repairs, and insights for handling challenging vehicles safely.

item.title: Are German Cars Worth Buying?
item.description: An evaluation of German cars, discussing reliability, maintenance costs, and features to help buyers make an informed decision on whether they’re a practical choice.

item.title: 2023 Audi SQ5 Without Warranty
item.description: A 2023 Audi SQ5 without warranty is inspected and serviced, highlighting potential issues, maintenance needs, and tips for caring for a new vehicle responsibly.
